examples.example: 我每天开车去上班，一路欣赏着沿途的美丽风景。

translate.english: I drive to work every day, enjoying the beautiful scenery along the way.

examples.example: 周末的时候，我喜欢开车去郊外享受大自然的美好风光。

translate.english: On weekends, I like to drive to the suburbs to enjoy the beautiful scenery of nature.

examples.example: 我开车带着家人一起去海边度假，大家都非常开心。

translate.english: I drove with my family to the seaside for vacation and everyone was very happy.
